Name: Sprite Sequence Chapter 2
About the game: The second Chapter of the Sprite Sequence saga. Haven't played Chapter 1 yet? It's FREE on Steam! Head over to its page to start the adventure. Thrown into a new, unknown world, our protagonist will have to learn to fend for himself and survive in the wild before he can be freed from his ordeal. Key features : - Story oriented - Exploration with light puzzle and combat sections - One part features a small farm simulation! - Hand-drawn and animated - Around 30 to 40 minutes long Chapter 2 is a higher-definition compilation of the short game sequences #11 to #26 published weekly in 2016. The improvisation based process at the heart of the project gave rise to a surprising story that is getting more complex and detailed in this chapter.
